column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: ------A driver was injured after a Prius hit the central divider.------The incident happened at 10.10 pm on August 21
column4: 2019 along the Russian Federation Road on the January bridge in Depot 3 commune
column8: was driving a white TOVOTA PRIUS at speed. The car smashed the concrete
column10: and the car tried to drive about 50m but lost the right front tire.------After the incident
